content.html:
Mastodon User Name Change

@manton ‚Ä¶ maybe I am misunderstanding?

Nothing changed in app or on web but if it is going to happen, count me as a vote against the idea. I like to see accounts based on what service they are on. This sounds like no distinction will exist?
I reject lists for lists sake. I need context and clarity around why the list is there at all and why it is relevant to me.

üîó The Why of the Guns

This is how Jim Crow rolls on in the 21st century. Yes, it‚Äôs about the guns. But the guns are about the racism. If my fellow men weren‚Äôt so damned racist, so scared of ‚Äúthe other,‚Äù they wouldn‚Äôt be getting killy, fewer people would be getting killed, and de-escalation could begin.

As it is, you‚Äôre safer in Kyiv. ¬†
